short_summary: Request for Information: Diluent (Phenol Phosphate-Citrate based Buffer with 45% Glycerol) in glass vials and empty sterile glass vials
description: The Government of Canada (GOC) seeks to collect information from companies on their manufacturing and development capacity related to a unique formulation of diluent (Phenol Phosphate-Citrate based Buffer with 45% Glycerol) for a specific application.
full_summary:
# Government Contract Opportunity

**Notice Title**
 BUFFERED DILUENT CONTAINING GLYCEROL AND STERILE EMPTY VIALS WITH CAP ENCLOSURE

## Background
The Government of Canada requires a supplier to manufacture and provide a unique formulation of diluent consisting of Phenol Phosphate-Citrate based Buffer with 45% Glycerol. This diluent will be packaged in 2 mL glass vials and sterile empty 2mL glass vials with a removable cap enclosure system.

## Solicitation Information
### Solicitation Number
 WS4617512505

### Publication Date
2024-06-03

### Tender Closing Date
2024-07-03T14:00:00

### Contracting Authority
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### End User
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) and Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC)

### Trade Agreements
This solicitation applies to companies who are eligible to participate in the following trade agreements: Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement.

### Regions of Delivery
National Capital Region (NCR)

### Contact
For more information, please contact Eric Vettoretti at [eric.vettoretti@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:eric.vettoretti@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

### Notice URL
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19898306?extsite=MTk4OTgzMDZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
